fields.value: Higher Education General Information Survey (HEGIS), 1980-1981:  Earned Degrees

authorName.value: United States Department of Education. National Center for Education Statistics

authorAffiliation.value: United States Department of Education. National Center for Education Statistics

dsDescriptionValue.value: The Higher Education General Information Survey (HEGIS)  series was designed to provide comprehensive information on various  aspects of postsecondary education in the United States and its  territories (American Samoa, Guam, Puerto Rico, the Virgin Islands,  and the Marshall Islands) and Department of Defense schools outside  the United States. Data are available for both public and private  two-year and four-year institutions. The HEGIS Earned Degrees  component for 1980-1981 offers data on the type and control of  institution, and the total count, by field of study, of earned degrees  and other formal awards conferred by each institution surveyed. Key  data elements, presented for up to four record types for each  institution (corresponding to level of degree or award), include sex of student and field of specialty.

topicClassValue.value: IDRC VI. Human Dimension of International Relations

fields.value: Version Date: 1999-02-25Version Text: 1999-02-25 Subject: null  Type: null  Notes: LRECL;Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: (1) The HEGIS Record Layout file (Part 2) is an Excel  worksheet of record layouts for all components of the HEGIS survey,  including the 1980-1981 Earned Degrees component. (2) Columns 155-170  are not used in this survey. (3) The 1980-1981 survey includes an  additional category for level of degree for intermediate programs  between the master's degree and the doctoral degree. This accounts  for the change from three record types in previous years to four  record types for 1980-1981. (4) This collection has not been processed  by ICPSR staff. ICPSR is distributing the data and documentation for  this collection in essentially the same form in which they were  received. When appropriate, hardcopy documentation has been converted  to machine-readable form and variables have been recoded to ensure  respondents' anonymity. (5) The codebook and data collection  instrument are provided as a Portable Document Format (PDF) file. The  PDF file format was developed by Adobe Systems Incorporated and can be  accessed using PDF reader software, such as the Adobe Acrobat  Reader. Information on how to obtain a copy of the Acrobat Reader is provided through the ICPSR Website on the Internet.; Subject: null  Type: null  Notes: Data file(s), and electronic documentation.;

distributorAffiliation.value: Institute for Social Research, University of Michigan

seriesName.value: Higher Education General Information Survey (HEGIS) Series

otherGeographicCoverage.value: Virgin Islands of the United States

value: All postsecondary institutions in operation during  1980-1981 in the United States and its territories (American Samoa,  Guam, Puerto Rico, the Virgin Islands, and the Marshall Islands) and Department of Defense schools outside the United States.
